sentences.sContent: However, some people consider glossary and taxonomy as metadata as well.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, some people consider glossary and taxonomy as metadata as well.
sentences.sCn: 不过，有些人认为词汇表和分类法也属于元数据的范畴。

sentences.sContent: This also grants read access to each taxonomy and category that you have read access to.
sentences.sContent_eng: This also grants read access to each taxonomy and category that you have read access to.
sentences.sCn: 还授予对您已具有读访问权的每种分类法和类别的读访问权。

sentences.sContent: This also grants read, edit, or delete access to each taxonomy and category that you have read, edit, or delete access to.
sentences.sContent_eng: This also grants read, edit, or delete access to each taxonomy and category that you have read, edit, or delete access to.
sentences.sCn: 这还授予对您已具有读取、编辑或删除访问权的每种分类法和类别的读取、编辑或删除访问权。

words.tran: [生物] 分类的；[生物] 分类学的
整腹法；反射运动；分类法；（古希腊军队的）分队；排列

trans.tranOther: the process or a system of organizing things into different groups that show their natural relationships, especially plants or animals
